overview: She's part Bonnie- part Clyde- a little bit Thelma and a lot like Louise. She's Christy Canyon- and she's tearing up the road in Crazed 2. There's cons- cars- and a stew of cheating husbands. And there may not be a happy ending. But at least there's justice. Crazed 2. Watch it before you merge.
title: Crazed 2
